&teiHeader; &facsimile;
Alle halewene da&ydot; we holdez &punctelev; one time in þe &yogh;ere
Fo&rrot; manie enche&slong;one&slong;
holie churche Holie Churche
&punctelev; þare to u&slong; gan lere
On i&slong; fo&rrot; þe gretegrete noumb&rrot;e &punctelev; þat of alle halewe is
Þat euerech ne mai nou&yogh;t at i&slong; fe&slong;te &punctelev; ane da&ydot; habbe iwis
An oþur is þat we beoth feble &punctelev; þat we ne mouwen nou&yogh;t alle
Þe fe&slong;tene bi heom &slong;ulf holde &punctelev; a&slong;e hu&ydot; in þe &yogh;ere doth falle
Þe þridde anche&slong;on is fo&rrot; þe &yogh;er is &slong;cho&rrot;t &punctelev; a&slong;e ech ne ma&ydot; nou&yogh;th allone
Þe fe&slong;te habbe in þe &yogh;ere &punctelev; þare hu&ydot; habbez imone ·
Þe feo&rrot;þe enche&slong;un i&slong; iwi&slong;&punctelev;fo&rrot; guod ri&yogh;ht it is withalle
Þat we of heom maken fe&slong;te&punctelev; &yogh;wane þe time doth falle
Fo&rrot; gret fe&slong;te hu&ydot; makiez in heouene&punctelev; and in grete Io&ydot;e beoth
&YOGH;wan hu&ydot; an&ydot; amendement &punctelev; of us on v&rrot;þe i&slong;eoth
Fo&rrot; þe guod&slong;pel &slong;eith of swich gret [choice]Io&ydot;e &punctelev; þat among heom in heouene is
&YOGH;wane ani of u&slong; amendi wole &punctelev; of þat we doth amis
¶Þe fifte enche&slong;un is fo&rrot; þare wa&slong; &punctelev; a fo&rrot;bu&ydot;&slong;ne þarof bigonne
Longue are þe &slong;trencþe of [choice]cristinedom &punctelev; on v&rrot;þe were iwonne
Fo&rrot; þe he&ydot;&yogh;e ma&ydot;&slong;tres of sare&slong;ins &punctelev; þat on v&rrot;þe weren þo her
Maden ech maumat bi heom&slong;ulf &punctelev; at rome on [choice]Auter
Ac natheles of eche ne mi&yogh;hte he nou&yogh;t &punctelev; fo&rrot; here gode&slong; &slong;o fale were
And hu&ydot; nolden nou&yogh;th þat ani god were &punctelev; withoute honour þere
Þarefo&rrot;e hu&ydot; maden on [choice]Auter &punctelev; commu&ydot;n to echone
Fo&rrot;to honouri alle heo&rrot;e gode&slong; þare &punctelev; a&slong;e it were al imone
And &slong;ethþe þo [choice]cristinedom cam &punctelev; and &slong;w&ydot;þe wide &slong;p&rrot;adde
At rome and eke elles&yogh;ware &punctelev; clanliche þe ma&ydot;&slong;trie hadde
¶Bonefas, þe guode pope &punctelev; to þe fal&slong;e [choice]Autere&slong; cam
And of þe [choice]Autere of alle godes &punctelev; grete &yogh;eme he nam
In fo&rrot;ebu&ydot;&slong;ne þarof &punctelev; ane churche he liet arere
Of o&rrot;e lauedi and of alle haluwene &punctelev; in þulke place þere
Ake six hund&rrot;et &yogh;er and fiue &punctelev; o&rrot;e louerd ]bifo&rrot;e
Of marie is &slong;uete moder &punctelev; on v&rrot;þe wa&slong; ibo&rrot;e
¶Þe churche þat of o&rrot;e lauedi wa&slong; &punctelev; and of alle halewene þo bifounde
Stant &yogh;eot at rome and is icleped &punctelev; [choice]Marie la rounde
Þe [name]pope al&slong;o Bonefaz &punctelev; ane da&ydot; in þe &yogh;ere
In þe honour of alle halewene &punctelev; he liet halewi þere
And hiet al&slong;o þo&rrot;u&yogh;h al [choice]cristinedom &punctelev; halewi þilke da&ydot;
Ake þulke t&ydot;me he wa&slong; iholde &punctelev; þe endlefte dai of ma&ydot;
Ake þe [name]pope Grego&rrot;i &punctelev; þat þareaftur longue cam
I&slong;a&ydot;&yogh; þat þe da&ydot; to halewi wa&slong; &punctelev; ope al [choice]cristindom
And þat ri&yogh;ht wa&slong; þat ech man &punctelev; þe hexte and le&slong;te
In þe honour of alle haluwene &punctelev; made þane da&ydot; fe&slong;te
And in a &slong;kars t&ydot;me of þe &yogh;ere &punctelev; a&slong;e we w&ydot;ten it wa&slong; in [choice]Ma&ydot;
So gret fe&slong;te fo&rrot;to holde &punctelev; a&slong;e ful to þad da&ydot;
Þarefo&rrot;e he liet þane da&ydot; tu&ydot;rne &punctelev; a&slong;e we him holdez &yogh;u&ydot;te
In þe fur&slong;te dai of nouemb&rrot;e &punctelev; &yogh;wane ech guod ni&slong; nouh&yogh;t &slong;o lu&ydot;te
¶Me þinchez, &yogh;u&ydot;t quath þe guode man &punctelev; þe fe&slong;te feble were
bote [choice]Men hadden &yogh;warewith &punctelev; þe wombe [choice]Io&ydot;e arere
¶Þe fur&slong;te &yogh;er þareafturward &punctelev; þat men þane da&ydot; þu&slong; nome
Of a fair cas ich ma&ydot; telle &punctelev; þat bifeol in þe [place]churche of rome
Þe wardein of [place]seint petere&slong; church &punctelev; þat &yogh;u&ydot;t in [place]rome is
Þe fe&slong;te honourede &slong;w&ydot;þe muche &punctelev; of alle halewene iwi&slong;
on alle haleweneda&ydot; in churche &punctelev; to ech auter he gan gon
And honourede ech aftur oþur &punctelev; he ne liet nou&yogh;ht on
To þe hei&yogh;e auter of [name]seint petre &punctelev; ate la&slong;te he wende
And þare he la&ydot; adoun an &slong;lep &punctelev; a&slong;e god him grace &slong;ende
him þou&yogh;te þare cam an [choice]Aungel &punctelev; and ladde him to heouene on hei&yogh;h
In a cha&ydot;ere with gret [choice]Io&ydot;e &punctelev; o&rrot;e louerd him þou&yogh;hte he &slong;ei&yogh;h
with grete hei&yogh;hne&slong;&slong;e &slong;itte &punctelev; and [choice]Aungles him alaboute
¶Þo cam þa&rrot;e a fair leuedi &punctelev; with [choice]Ma&ydot;denes a gret route
Þat wa&slong; o&rrot;e lauedi with virgine&slong; &punctelev; and o&rrot;e louerd faire heo grette
Ore louerd a&yogh;ein hire aros &punctelev; and bi him fa&ydot;re hire &slong;ette
Þo cam þare a [choice]Man in o sclaue&ydot;n &punctelev; a&slong;e hit of a [choice]Cama&ydot;le were
And olde ho&rrot;e [choice]Men aftur him &punctelev; and honoureden god þere
Þat wa&slong; [name]seint Iohan þe bapti&slong;t &punctelev; and þe
prfete&slong; profete&slong;
olde
And al&slong;o þe patriarke&slong; &punctelev; þat of o&rrot;e louerd &yogh;w&ydot;lene tolde
¶Þo comen þare twelue in one route &punctelev; a&slong;e bi&slong;chope&slong; it weren echone
Þe fur&slong;te a&slong;e hu&ydot; pope&slong; weren &punctelev; bifo&rrot;e he &yogh;eode al one
Þat wa&slong; [name]seint petre &punctelev; and his felawe&slong; endleuene
Alle hu&ydot; honourede o&rrot;e louerd &punctelev; þare he &slong;at in heouene
¶Þo comen þare a&slong;e hit kn&ydot;&yogh;hte&slong; weren &punctelev; redie fo&rrot;to fi&yogh;hte
Alblodie fo&rrot;to defendi o&rrot;e louerd &punctelev; and [choice]holie churche ri&yogh;hte
Þat weren
Mart&ydot;s Mart&ydot;rs
þat fo&rrot; god &punctelev; and
holie church Holie Church
al&slong;o
&YOGH;euen heo&rrot;e lif a&slong;e gode&slong; kn&ydot;&yogh;hte&slong; &punctelev; and to deþe weren ido
¶Þo cam þare a gret compa&ydot;gnie &punctelev; p&rrot;eo&slong;te&slong; a&slong;e þei it were
Þat weren þe confe&slong;&slong;ours &punctelev; þat hadden
holie church Holie Church
to lere
A&slong;e bi&slong;chopes and [choice]Abbodes &punctelev; and oþur guode men al&slong;o
Ore louerd hu&ydot; honoureden alle &punctelev; a&slong;e heo&rrot;e ri&yogh;hte wa&slong; to do
Of fe&slong;te þat [choice]Men on vrþe maden &punctelev; hu&ydot; [damage]þonkeden him and bade
Fo&rrot; alle þat ari&yogh;ht heo&rrot;e da&ydot; heolden &punctelev; and fe&slong;te of heom made
¶Þo goune hu&ydot; &slong;ingue heo&rrot;e [choice]Matines &punctelev; sw&ydot;þ murie withalle
Fo&rrot; alle þat honouriez heo&rrot;e da&ydot; here &punctelev; a&slong;e heo in þe &yogh;ere doth falle
Wel ou&yogh;hte we þane da&ydot; honouren &punctelev; &yogh;wane hu&ydot; þat ilke da&ydot;
Swuch [choice]Io&ydot;e fo&rrot; u&slong; in heouene maden &punctelev; a&slong;e þe guode [choice]Man i&slong;a&ydot;
Nou bidde alle halewene &punctelev; þat we heo&rrot;e fe&slong;te holden so
Þat hu&ydot; u&slong; b&rrot;inguen to þe he&ydot;&yogh;e [choice]Io&ydot;e &punctelev; þare hu&ydot; buth inne ido
